name: The Escapists: The Walking Dead
summary: The Escapists: The Walking Dead is a 8-bit video game developed by Team 17. It is based on Robert Kirkman's The Walking Dead comic series and The Escapists, which was developed by Mouldy Toof Studios and published by Team 17 LTD.
info:
• 中文名: 逃狱：行尸走肉
  • 别名: 逃脱者：行尸走肉
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Strategy
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2015年9月30日
  • 售价: $19.99
  • 开发: Team17 Digital Ltd
  • 发行: Team17 Digital Ltd
